topic.title: VerifyError: Content too large: in main.py line 198 > ContentManager.py line 736 > ContentManager.py line 841
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.5
  * Operating system: Ubuntu Disco
  * Web browser: Firefox 67.0 && Firefox Dev.
  * Tor status: enabled && always
  * Opened port: yes
  * Special configuration: N/A

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

When attempting to sign my site I receive the following error:

`VerifyError: Content too large 99999999B > 10485760B, aborting task... in main.py line 198 > ContentManager.py line 736 > ContentManager.py line 841`

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. Have a large site
  2. Attempt to sign it.
  3. Receive error

#### Observed Results:

  * What happened?

https://asciinema.org/a/H5fTY5spiv3Pl8UeDrGd9Xqgj

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?

To sign and publish my site
